data.event: Galena ore was discovered in 1885 while digging a well on the farm of Thomas D. Liles in November, 1885, marking the beginning of Aurora as a mining town.
Mining of surface outcrops began in 1886.

event.title: 1893 12,651 tons of zinc ore were mined and shipped

data.event: By 1893 12,651 tons of zinc ore were mined and shipped from Aurora.
